document_data.name: Stoan
document_data.mainbody: '''Sergeant Stoan''' was a veteran [[Purple Dragons|Purple Dragon]] who commanded the [[Border Outpost (Cormyr)|border outpost]] on the [[Moonsea Ride]] north of [[Arabel]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Stoan was a large, burly man.
document_data.Personality: Stoan was a simple, conscientious soldier who loved [[Cormyr]] and wished to do right by others. He took care of the Dragons under him and made sure that travelers were treated fairly at his outpost.
document_data.Possessions: Stoan wore ''+2 [[chainmail]]'' and carried a ''+1 [[longsword]]''. He also carried a master key for unlocking the most secure doors in the outpost.
document_data.Activities: As commander of the outpost, he was responsible for his ten Purple Dragons, as well as the [[War Wizards|War Wizard]] [[Torvis Mull]]. He greeted and interviewed travelers on the road as they entered Cormyr, and patiently informed them of the [[laws of Cormyr]] to ensure there were no misunderstandings.
